title: A unified theory of order flow, market impact, and volatility1footnote 11footnote 1Youssef Ouazzani Chahdi, Mathieu Rosenbaum and Grégoire Szymanski gratefully acknowledge support from the ILB Chair Artificial Intelligence and Quantitative Methods for Finance at University Paris Dauphine-PSL.
